title: Best ad campaigns worldwide 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of points for 10 number of Campaign/Brand (Agency)s.

The Number of points is appeared to be the highest at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) and lowest at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York).
The difference of Number of points between the highest and lowest Campaign/Brand (Agency) is 31.2.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of points for 10 number of Campaign/Brand (Agency)s.

Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) has the highest Number of points and Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) has the lowest Number of points.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of points for 10 number of Campaign/Brand (Agency)s.

The Number of points is appeared to be the highest at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) and lowest at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York).

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Campaign/Brand (Agency) in the x axis and Number of points in the y axis.

Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) has the highest Number of points and Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) has the lowest Number of points.
The second highest Number of points is appeared to be the Campaign/Brand (Agency) Healthy Hands Chalk Sticks / Savlon (Ogilvy Mumbai).
The difference of Number of points between the highest and lowest Campaign/Brand (Agency) is 31.2.

Number of points at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) is 75.2 , second place is Healthy Hands Chalk Sticks / Savlon (Ogilvy Mumbai) at 72.8, and thirdly is India's Newest Status Symbol / Harpic (McCann New Delhi) at 63.3.
Considered together, the average Number of points in all 10 Campaign/Brand (Agency)s is roughly 56.92.
Summing up the values of all Campaign/Brand (Agency)s, we get total 569.2.
